title: 7th Level Wizard

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Cast Evard’s Black Tentacles on someone, causing them to become restrained. They are roleblocked and must roll a 16 or higher on a d20 to stop being restrained. You may only do this once per long rest (one night without doing an action)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the necronomicon, you level up and become an 8th level wizard. You switch out Evard’s Black Tentacle for Banishment. With Banishment, your target is banished to their home plane if they don’t role a 16 or higher on a d20. If you are not attacked that night, your target is permanently banished if they fail the save. They will have their role and will hidden upon their disappearance being announced the following morning. If you are attacked, your target is only roleblocked for that night, but not permanently banished. You also gain basic defense
- After leveling up, you may cast Banishment twice per long rest instead of once

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - A fellow coven member may multitask casting silvery barbs on your target once per long rest that you take to make your target reroll their save
